meanings.definition: The clothes, linen, and other belongings collected by a bride for her marriage.
meanings.sent1: The bride carefully packed her trousseau with her favorite dresses and jewelry.
meanings.sent2: She received a beautiful trousseau from her family as a wedding gift.
meanings.sent3: The trousseau was so full of clothes that it almost burst at the seams!
meanings.sent4: Her trousseau was a treasure chest of memories waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent5: The trousseau sparkled with the promise of a new beginning.

meanings.definition: A collection of personal belongings or clothing.
meanings.sent1: His trousseau included his favorite books and childhood toys.
meanings.sent2: She packed her trousseau with warm sweaters and comfortable shoes for the trip.
meanings.sent3: The trousseau spilled out of the suitcase, revealing a mix of colors and textures.
meanings.sent4: His trousseau was a reflection of his eclectic taste and unique style.
meanings.sent5: The trousseau held all the memories he cherished most.
